entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 in the evening then light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
